com.github.lucbui.gba

Class GBAPointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.gba.GBAPointer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GBAPointer>

    public class GBAPointer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer, java.lang.Comparable<GBAPointer>, java.io.Serializable
    A GBA-style pointer. A GBA Pointer is four bytes long, with the MSB indicating which memory field it should come from. The remaining three bytes indicate location in that memory address. Various validation checks also are used for each memory field, since not all memory can be accessed in a given field. (To avoid validation, use valueOfNoRangeCheck()).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
